commit message:
Fix typo in chapter 10.4 (Dynamic routing)

Closes: #737255
Signed-off-by: Raphaël Hertzog <hertzog@debian.org>

Fix typo in Appendix B.2.2

Closes: #737884
Signed-off-by: Raphaël Hertzog <hertzog@debian.org>

fr-FR: Fix typo serrvice -> service

Reported-by: Maki Doko

Integrate improvements from the French version of the book

* Some layout changes to put more importance on sidebar title
compared to the pre-title
* Drop some useless section headings
* Lots of small improvements in the French translation

fr-FR: Integrate typo fixes from Cascador

And fix the path for yum repository files in the English string
as well as all the translations.
it-IT: Updated translation of chapters 00a, 00b, 06 and 09 for wheezy

Drop sidebar about buggy lxc-debian template script

The template script has been fixed in Debian 7.4 with
lxc 0.8.0~rc1-8+deb7u2.

it-IT: Updated translation of chapter 03 thanks to Daniele Forsì

Fixes to 06_apt.po file.

Improve build/build-pdf script to not add a duplicate lang attribute

Old versions of Publican do not add the lang attribute that dblatex
needs so we were adding it in the script. Now, newer versions do, so we
should only add it if it's not there yet.
pt-BR: Markup fixes so that HTML/ePub build works

Fix output in a sample in the short remedial course

Reported-by: Claudio Filho <filhocf@gmail.com>
Move page numbers further inwards to avoid problems with some print-on-demand services

zh-CN: Translated using Weblate.

本段的最后一句很奇怪，最后一句我觉得不应该出现在这里，谈论 apt 就谈论 apt，干嘛提到使用它的公司？是不是该向作者提一下意见。如果这到处有这样奇怪的内容，这书能称为好书吗？
